page.title: 06LOCAL EVENTS
page.content: WHEELBARROW PUSH In 1984 it was decided by the Hinstock Parish Council that a fund raising event for the church should be held. MR and MRS Lutner organised a Wheelbarrow Push. The wheelbarrows were decorated and pushed by teams of two. Much fun was had by the locals and four hundred pounds was raised for the church restoration fund. The event is to be held again in 1985 and decorated teddybear and bicycle pushes are to b1e included. HINSTOCK FLOWER FESTIVAL In 1984 Hinstock had a flower festival in aid of ST.Oswald'S church.The event lasted for four days.Many flowers decorated the church. Concerts were held on two evenings.The festival raised over one thousand pounds.The money helped to mend the organ and the church roof.
